books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, a former military cop, helps the State Department and the C.I.A. stop a sniper who has targeted a G8 summit.
books.name: PERSONAL

books.author: by Jan Karon
books.description: The Mitford character Father Tim Kavanagh returns to his native town to find friends and family wrestling with difficulties.
books.name: SOMEWHERE SAFE WITH SOMEBODY GOOD

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Russell Blake
books.description: The treasure hunters Sam and Remi Fargo discover a Viking ship in the Arctic ice, full of artifacts from pre-Columbian Mexico.
books.name: THE EYE OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Tana French
books.description: A clue to a murder on the grounds of a girls’ school in the Dublin suburbs appears on a bulletin board, and Detectives Stephen Moran and Antoinette Conway investigate.
books.name: THE SECRET PLACE

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands. There she begins an affair with James Fraser, a redheaded soldier. Originally published in 1991.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A North Carolina pediatrician is held captive by a mysterious man who forces her to question her life.
books.name: MEAN STREAK

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: In Book 26 (and part of a sub-trilogy) of the Dark series, Zev, an elite warrior, wonders about the future of the Carpathians.
books.name: DARK BLOOD

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by David Mitchell
books.description: Stories from the medieval Swiss Alps to the 19th-century Australian bush to a hotel in Shanghai to Manhattan in the near future are stitched together.
books.name: THE BONE CLOCKS

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: The story of Grant and Harlow continues; Book 7 in the Rosemary Beach series.
books.name: ONE MORE CHANCE

books.author: by Sherrilyn Kenyon
books.description: Book 18 of the Dark-Hunter novels finds Cadegan, who has been damned for centuries, in pursuit of Josette Landry.
books.name: SON OF NO ONE

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: The men in the Sisterhood’s lives join forces to see justice served.
books.name: COUNTDOWN

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Twenty-five years after their high school romance ended, a man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their North Carolina town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW
